channel.title: Java not allowing me to compile my server
channel.description:
please will someone possibly leave a good explanations or description of what i can do due to i cannot compile without an eritating message appears saying:
javac is not recognised as an internal or external command ...... please press any key to continue
wtf is that all about i have the latest java thats what my computer says and still doesnt work please help some one i will apprecaite soooo much
dan boi 89[br][size=1]Posted at: August 31, 2006, 02:00:35 PM[/size][hr]please can sombody help me

item.title: Java not allowing me to compile my server
item.dc:creator: @pancholip pancholip
item.description:
@pancholip wrote:

the complier works lol, now you just gotta fix the errors :). some errors are obvious like the complier will you’re missing a ; … so just go put in a ; lol.if the error is in lets say client.java… client.java will NOT compile till theres no errors.

item.source: Java not allowing me to compile my server

item.title: Java not allowing me to compile my server
item.dc:creator: @pancholip pancholip
item.description:
@pancholip wrote:

edit compile and put this in:

@echo off
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_08\bin/java.exe” server
pause

make sure you have jdk and jre version 1.5 update 8

Read full topic
